MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH7 postcode area of Mold, affecting a number of properties in a widespread area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our overhead line network  and our team are now working to get the power back on via generator as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:35pm on the 22nd December 2020.
